roleset.name: keep from spending

role.descr: entity saving money, cause of savings, not necessarily recipient!

example.name: save-v: transitive
example.text: Unisys said that should help it save $500 million a year in costs, again at the high end of the previously reported range of $400 million to $500 million.
example.arg: $500 million a year in costs, again at the high end of the previously reported range of $400 million to $500 million.

example.name: save-v: with reason
example.text: In following several other oil and gas partnerships that have made the conversion to a corporation in the last year, NRM also noted that tax advantages for partnerships have diminished under new tax laws and said it would save $2 million a year in administrative costs from the change.
example.arg: $2 million a year in administrative costs

example.name: ARG3 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: This alone saves more than 20 million yuan in costs for the factory each year .
example.arg: more than 20 million yuan in costs

example.name: save-v: with causal agent
example.text: [The combined effect of these changes]-1 is expected *trace*-1 to save the company about $4 million in interest expenses next year, or six cents a share.

roleset.note: SAVE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'save' based on financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry get-13.5.1, bill-54.5. Use this sense for cases where SOME money is being spent, but not as much as could have been. The money not spent is the money saved. It's not that that money is specifically being collected, it's just not spent. (from save.01-v)
SAVING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from saving.01-n)

roleset.name: desperate peril sense

example.name: save-v: just transitive
example.text: Some of the money will go to the Chico Mendes Foundation, but it isn't earmarked for groups-1 trying *trace*-1 to save the rain forest.

example.name: save-v: with peril
example.text: The purpose of the note is to provide added capital for the spun-off company in a form that *trace* will save it spending cash on immediate interest payments, Mr. Roulac said.
example.arg: spending cash on immediate interest payments,

roleset.note: SAVE-V NOTES: Following Treebank, I read this as "save it FROM spending cash...". (from save.02-v)
SAVING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from saving.02-n)

roleset.name: collect, accrue, save up (non phrasal, though)

example.name: save-v: intransitive
example.text: And they can further reduce the monthly amount if they start saving earlier -- when mother and child come home from the hospital.
example.arg: earlier -- when mother and child come home from the hospital.

example.name: save-v: all args, many anaphora
example.text: When the motorist returned to his car he could turn the card off and, if it showed time remaining, save it for later.

example.name: saving-n
example.text: -LRB- My husband said that if I am pregnant , the money we have is not enough . I said that we will borrow from my mother first . It can not affect our money saving

roleset.note: SAVE-V NOTES: This sense and save.02 (desperate peril) lead to the wonderful pun:"Save the whales--collect a complete set!" Hard to distinguish from save.01, also shares a VN class: get-13.5.1-1. Nominal 'saving' based on BOLT-6. (from save.03-v)
SAVING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from saving.03-n)

roleset.name: collect, accrue (phrasal variant)

example.name: save_up-v: transitive
example.text: ``We're not asking them [*] to save up 50 proof-of-purchases.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2
example.text: Yammi and I are saving up for one of those V C R's that have the mode ,
example.arg: for one of those V C R's that have the mode

roleset.note: SAVING_UP-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from saving.04-n)

roleset.name: able to not be spent

example.name: saveable-j
example.text: $1000 is totally saveable if you put away a little every paycheck.
example.arg: if you put away a little every paycheck.

roleset.note: SAVEABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on save.01. (from saveable.01-j)

roleset.name: able to be rescued from peril

example.name: saveable-j: arg1
example.text: There 's a lot -- well , by linguistics standards , a lot -- of money floating around for doing exactly this , and it sounds like Mosuo is one language that [*] might be saveable if you can bring it to the attention of the appropriate professionals .
example.arg: if you can bring it to the attention of the appropriate professionals

roleset.note: SAVEABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-2,3, save.02. (from saveable.02-j)

roleset.name: able to be collected, accrued

example.name: saveable-j: arg1
example.text: It's an obvious fact that if everything is monetarized and money is saveable and circulatory then I simply cannot choose not to participate in a transaction that my life depends on if my savings of money is limited.

roleset.note: SAVEABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on save.03. (from saveable.03-j)
